resources.string: The 30 Days of Android Development
Day 1: Introduction to Android Compose

Day 6: Text and Typography in Compose
Day 7: Buttons and Clickable Components
Day 8: Images and Image Loading in Compose
Day 9: Lists and RecyclerView in Compose
Day 10: Handling Forms and Input in Compose
Day 11: Animations in Compose
Day 12: Themed UI and Dark Mode Support
Day 13: Custom Views and Drawing in Compose
Day 14: Accessibility in Compose
Day 15: Testing in Compose - Unit and UI Tests
Day 16: Working with Databases in Compose
Day 17: Network Requests and API Integration
Day 18: Compose and Jetpack Libraries Integration
Day 19: Compose for Wearables and Large Screens
Day 20: Handling Background Tasks in Compose
Day 21: Performance Optimization in Compose
Day 22: Memory Management and Leaks
Day 23: Code Organization and Architecture
Day 24: Localization and Internationalization in Compose
Day 25: Continuous Integration and Deployment
Day 26: Building a To-Do App with Compose
Day 27: Implementing Authentication in Compose
Day 28: Integrating Maps and Location Services
Day 29: Implementing Notifications in Compose
Day 30: Final Project and Recap
